info.name: Add a custom banner easily
info.description: Compatible with other MyAnimeList themes! Add custom logos, backgrounds, and characters to the top of all forum, club, and profile pages. Easily adjust and change images right here on the install page under Customize Settings!
info.additionalInfo:
Great custom logo generator: http://cooltext.com/
More characters here: http://imgur.com/a/ydViG#0
You can download the logos or images and use them on this theme's page.

settings.label: Amount of space at top of page (optional; default 140)
